devdoc.details: This contract manages a trading pair in the DEX, handling liquidity, trading, and fee mechanisms.

params.from: Address from which liquidity is added.
params.wholePayment: Details of the payment for adding liquidity.

params.to: Address to which the amount is transferred.

constructor.details: Constructor for initializing the Pair contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.inPayment: Details of the payment for the sell order.
params.outPair: Address of the pair to sell to.
params.referrerOfCaller: Address of the referrer of the caller.

takeFees(address,uint256,uint256).details: This must be called on the out pair side

params.amount: amount to compute and deduct fee from
params.referrer: the user address to receive part of fee

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Pair

ErrorSafePriceCurrentIndex(uint256,uint2.notice: The current safe price index of `currentIndex` is greater than the maximum number of observations `maxIndex`

completeSell(address,uint256).notice: Completes a sell order on the outPair side.

reserve().notice: Returns the total amount of tradeToken that can be bought from this Pair.

takeFees(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Takes fee and update balances of beneficiaries
